rrpss

Class Menu

  • Object
    • Menu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Menu
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Manages the AlaCarte and SetPackage of the Menu by providing accessor(get methods) of the list of List of alaCarte & setPackage, and individual alaCarte & setPackage, various methods to add new alaCartes/setPackages and remove existing alaCartes/setPackages.
    Author:
    Liu Liling
    See Also:
    Serializable, Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Vector<AlaCarte> alaCartes
      List of alaCarte and setPackage, implemented in Vector data structure.
      private int idCounter
      Id of setPackages, which is equal to the size of setPackages vector.
      private Vector<SetPackage> setPackages
      Id of alaCartes, which is equal to the size of alaCartes vector.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Menu()
      Constructs an Menu object and initialize the attributes alaCartes/setPackage and set idCounter to 1.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAlaCarte(AlaCarte ac)
      Add a alaCarte to the vector
      void addSetPackage(SetPackage sp)
      Add a setPackage to the vector

      Using alaCarte id to retreive a single AlaCarte object from the menu.

      Returns list of alaCartes in Vector data structure
      SetPackage getSetPackageById(int id)
      Using setPackage id to retreive a single SetPackage object from the menu.
      Vector<SetPackage> getSetPackages()
      Returns list of setPackages in Vector data structure
      void printMenu()
      Prints the current Menu information to standard output in a nice format.
      int removeAlaCarteById(int id)
      Using alaCarte id to select a alaCarte by its id and remove it from the alaCarte list (alaCarte)
      int removeSetPackageById(int id)
      Using setPackage id to select a setPackage by its id and remove it from the setPackage list (setPackage)

    • Field Detail

      • alaCartes

        private Vector<AlaCarte> alaCartes
        List of alaCarte and setPackage, implemented in Vector data structure. Each entry consists of a reference to existing AlaCarte/SetPackageobject.

      • setPackages

        private Vector<SetPackage> setPackages
        Id of alaCartes, which is equal to the size of alaCartes vector.

      • idCounter

        private int idCounter
        Id of setPackages, which is equal to the size of setPackages vector.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Menu

        public Menu()
        Constructs an Menu object and initialize the attributes alaCartes/setPackage and set idCounter to 1.

      • getAlaCartes

        public Vector<AlaCarte> getAlaCartes()
        Returns list of alaCartes in Vector data structure
        Returns:
        list of alaCartes in Vector data structure

      • getSetPackages

        public Vector<SetPackage> getSetPackages()
        Returns list of setPackages in Vector data structure
        Returns:
        list of setPackages in Vector data structure

      • getAlaCarteById

        public AlaCarte getAlaCarteById(int id)
        Using alaCarte id to retreive a single AlaCarte object from the menu.
        Parameters:
        id - the alaCarte id to be retreived.
        Returns:
        AlaCarte object of given id.

      • getSetPackageById

        public SetPackage getSetPackageById(int id)
        Using setPackage id to retreive a single SetPackage object from the menu.
        Parameters:
        id - the setPackage id to be retreived.
        Returns:
        SetPackage object of given id.

      • addAlaCarte

        public void addAlaCarte(AlaCarte ac)
        Add a alaCarte to the vector
        Parameters:
        ac - alaCarte object to be added

      • addSetPackage

        public void addSetPackage(SetPackage sp)
        Add a setPackage to the vector
        Parameters:
        sp - setPackage object to be added

      • removeAlaCarteById

        public int removeAlaCarteById(int id)
        Using alaCarte id to select a alaCarte by its id and remove it from the alaCarte list (alaCarte)
        Parameters:
        id - alaCarte id, positive integer less than or equal to numAlaCarte

      • removeSetPackageById

        public int removeSetPackageById(int id)
        Using setPackage id to select a setPackage by its id and remove it from the setPackage list (setPackage)
        Parameters:
        id - setPackage id, positive integer less than or equal to numSetPackage
        Returns:
        1 if successful, -1 otherwise.

      • printMenu

        public void printMenu()
        Prints the current Menu information to standard output in a nice format.
